# Auto-generated LLM Agent

This repository was created automatically by the LLM-Ops framework.

It includes:

- Enterprise folder structure under `src/llm/`
- Base agent class and an example `PayrollAgent`
- Prompt folder under `src/llm/prompts`
- Hooks for observability via the `info-llm-observe` wrapper
- Dockerfile to run the service
- A provision workflow under `.github/workflows/provision.yml` to register the project in Phoenix
